name: Arcana Famiglia: Festa Regalo
storyline: One autumn day, Felicita’s dad got bored and decided that he’s gonna make his mafia men have an iron chef battle. The prize is having his powers for 1 day and whether they like it or not, they must participate. It’s up to you and your chosen partner to run around, gather ingredients and make awesome dishes to please the judges.
summary: Arcana Famiglia: Festa Regalo is the third instalment of the La storia della Arcana Famiglia games released for Playstation Portable. It is a spin-off cooking game.
